PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-05502001-04-030,  ,  ,  PCO, 
PrecisAppointment of JOSEPH WILLIAM POTTER, of Cumberland, Ontario, as Vice-Chairperson of the Public Service Staff Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of two years; and orders that JOSEPH WILLIAM POTTER shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective April 1, 2001.
Attachments
